channel.title: Desktop problem
channel.description: Well eversince i reformated my desktop i've had this annoying problem every few minutes my desktop keeps refreshing the [b]start[/b]Bar and icons on my desktop disappear and refresh as if i was booting up i'm wondering if anyone has a solution to my problem and yes [b]i've tried googling it[/b]

item.title: Desktop problem
item.dc:creator: @K0rupt.net K0rupt.net
item.description:
@K0rupt.net wrote:

Well eversince i reformated my desktop i’ve had this annoying problem
every few minutes my desktop keeps refreshing the startBar and icons on my desktop disappear and refresh as if i was booting up i’m wondering if anyone has a solution to my problem
and yes i’ve tried googling it
